author: Calvin Kasulke, Amy Rose Spiegel, Rachel Miller
title: 6 Stories of Roommates Who Hooked Up While Isolating at Home Together
description: True tales of queer lust, gay yearning, and microwavable entrees, all under one roof.
content: Stories of self-isolated couples fighting have already been monetized for a good cause, but I don't particularly care about bean-bloated partners bickering about headphone etiquette. What I wanted to see on my TL was a flood of posts about queers in isolation… [+7496 chars]
